about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: I'm a software engineer with over 20 years of experience building scalable systems and innovative solutions. Currently serving as CTO at Minedia, a data technology startup where we raised approximately ¥500M in funding. My career has spanned multiple high-growth companies including Metaps, where I led the development of SPIKE (a zero-fee payment service), and GREE, where I managed social gaming platform development.
about.paragraph2: I hold a degree from Keio University Shonan Fujisawa Campus (2005) and studied at UCLA Extension (2006). My approach combines deep technical expertise with strategic thinking, enabling me to build systems that drive business growth while maintaining high engineering standards.

moderator.title: AI Moderator
moderator.subtitle: Highly Customizable Content Moderation System
moderator.description:
A flexible content moderation system that enables selection of optimal AI models based on specific use cases. Customers can freely configure system prompts and instructions for each organization, achieving moderation that perfectly aligns with industry-specific content guidelines and corporate policies.

Employs a multi-model architecture that integrates multiple AI models including OpenAI API in a unified management system. Flexibly switches between models with different characteristics—precision-focused, speed-focused, or cost-focused—depending on needs.

Featured in Nikkei as an emerging moderation service, it differentiates itself through complete customizability, providing ideal solutions for niche industries and companies with specialized content requirements.
moderator.tech: OpenAI API, Custom AI Models, React, Node.js

triathlon.title: Triathlon AI Analyzer
triathlon.subtitle: AI-Powered Training Analysis & Coaching Platform
triathlon.description:
A comprehensive platform providing support through a dual-AI analysis system with race result data from major Japanese races published as open source on GitHub. The race analysis engine powered by GPT-4o-mini provides free rankings, deviation scores, training advice, and race reviews.

Premium features include a personal coach AI using Gemini 2.5 Pro that generates daily training plans and provides detailed consultation based on comprehensive profiles and goals.

Achieves outstanding cost performance compared to TrainingPeaks and Strava, offering transparent training support through specialized analysis for the Japanese racing environment and an open-source data foundation.
triathlon.tech: GPT-4o-mini, Gemini 2.5 Pro, React, Python, Open Source Data

mineds.title: Mineds - Online Qualitative Research Service
mineds.description: Developed a platform to streamline online qualitative research. Built a system enabling user interviews, group discussions, and behavioral observations to be conducted online. Implemented real-time recording and analysis features to achieve DX in research operations.
mineds.tech: Ruby on Rails, React, WebRTC, AWS

gas.title: City Gas Retail Platform
gas.description: In response to city gas deregulation, developed a system for city gas retail application processing and integration with gas pipeline companies. Designed as a multi-tenant SaaS platform, enabling multiple retail operators to independently use the service while maintaining data isolation for each tenant and providing a shared functional foundation. Realized online workflow from application to gas meter opening.
gas.tech: Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, AWS, REST API, Multi-tenant SaaS

recall.title: Product Recall Collection System
recall.description: Developed a system to accept web-based product recall applications and integrate with multiple logistics companies. Implemented inventory coordination with logistics warehouses, delivery tracking, and automatic customer notifications. Built as a SaaS platform for multiple manufacturers.
recall.tech: Ruby on Rails, PostgreSQL, REST API Integration

spike.title: SPIKE - Zero-Fee Payment Service
spike.description: Developed and launched from scratch in 3 months an innovative service with zero payment fees. Built a payment platform for EC businesses supporting credit cards, bank transfers, and convenience store payments. Achieved security measures and PCI DSS compliance.
spike.tech: Ruby on Rails, MySQL, Redis, AWS, Payment API Integration

gree.title: GREE Smartphone Adaptation
gree.description: Developed and implemented a method to adapt existing mobile sites for smartphones in 1 hour. Achieved user agent detection, responsive design, and touch UI optimization. The tech blog post about this method received over 2,200 Hatena Bookmarks and generated significant industry attention.

cyta.title: Cyta.jp - C2C Learning Platform
cyta.description: Developed a C2C learning service platform from requirements definition. Built from scratch including teacher-student matching, lesson booking, payments, points system, and blog features. Also implemented instructor compensation management and student review systems.
cyta.tech: Ruby on Rails, MySQL, AWS, Payment API

teraren.title: teraren.com - 1TB Storage Rental Server
teraren.description: Rental server service providing large 1TB storage capacity. Implemented custom file management system, FTP access, and web-based control panel. Achieved long-term stable operation and served numerous users.

emoji.title: Emoji Sprite - OSS Library
emoji.description: Published as OSS a JavaScript library for efficiently displaying emojis as sprite images. Achieved performance optimization and cross-browser compatibility. Published on GitHub and gained numerous stars from the community.

covid19.title: COVID-19 Case Visualization System
covid19.description: Developed an automated system to collect open data on COVID-19 cases published by prefectures, visualize them as graphs, and automatically post daily updates to Twitter and WordPress. Crawled data every 10 minutes and immediately notified when new cases appeared. Supported multiple prefectures including Kanagawa, achieving over 2 years of continuous operation. Implemented in Ruby with Docker environment. Gained experiential understanding of challenges in open government data.
covid19.tech: Ruby, Docker, Twitter API, WordPress API, Gruff (Graph Library)

sfcCns.title: SFC CNS Guide - Editor-in-Chief
sfcCns.description: Served as editor for 3 years and Editor-in-Chief of the 'SFC CNS Guide,' an IT handbook for students at Keio University SFC. Systematically compiled technical information including Campus Network System (CNS) usage, programming, web design, and multimedia production. Led annual revisions to establish it as a widely-used resource from freshmen to advanced students. Oversaw the entire process including editorial team management, writer coordination, layout design, and print distribution.
sfcCns.tech: Technical Writing, Desktop Publishing, Team Management
